==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{zh-l|*木|wood}} is repeated twice to give the idea of multiple trees (compare {{zh-l|*森}}, {{zh-l|*𣓏}}, {{zh-l|*𣛧}}, {{zh-l|*𣡕}}, {{zh-l|*𣡽}}), thus a ''forest''.
